page.title: 12SCHOOLS
page.content: There were several schools in the parish but only one (NJ522320 Duffs School) was within this block. This was closed 12th Nov 1962 after the new school in the Lane was opened in that Oct with 49 pupils, rising to 65 with the extra pupils. A two-teacher open- plan classroom was added in 1980. The area of the school and ground is 0.7411h. The average roll is 50 with 3/2 full-time teachers (depending on numbers) and 6 visiting teachers. The usual subjects are taught with main emphasis placed on a good rapport between staff and pupils. There exists also a large fund of good-will between home and school with parents helping in various activities.We have an annual concert/ play/pantomime and party and annual outing for the whole family. A play-group is run by parents for the pre-school children.
